name: EP_NgU
description: NR End Point of the NG user plane (NG-U) interface between the gNB and the UPGW

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: id
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Used as an RDN when naming an instance of the object class.

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: userLabel
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: A user-friendly (and user assignable) name of this object

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: localAddress
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Includes IP address and VLAN ID used for initialization of the underlying transport

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: remoteAddress
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: IP address used for initialization of the underlying transport
